description: This is a React functional component named 'Card' that serves as a lightweight container with optional header and footer sections. It accepts props for title, actions, children, and footer, and renders a styled card layout accordingly.

methods.name: Card({ title, actions, children, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a card with optional header, body, and footer sections.
